changelog.summary: Initial development reset for next-generation schema and system features.

metadata.note: Completely redesigned for independent, CEU-viable, tobacconist-free education.

tieredStructure.description: Core fundamentals of cigar anatomy, wrapper origins, and sensory training
Intermediate knowledge in construction dynamics, blend architecture, and draw behavior
Advanced exploration of pairing logic, palate mapping, and flavor memory techniques

trustedSources.title: The Ultimate Cigar Book
trustedSources.author: Richard Carleton Hacker
trustedSources.notes: Comprehensive overview on history, etiquette, construction, storage, and pairings.

trustedSources.title: Perelman's Pocket Cyclopedia of Cigars
trustedSources.author: Richard Perelman
trustedSources.notes: Updated annually; contains detailed cigar brand profiles and vitola references.

trustedSources.title: The World of the Havana Cigar
trustedSources.author: Min Ron Nee
trustedSources.notes: Extremely detailed and rare; revered for Cuban cigar insights, production, and photography.

trustedSources.title: Cigar Aficionado’s World of Cigars
trustedSources.author: Marvin R. Shanken
trustedSources.notes: Visually engaging global cigar guide; includes interviews, factory tours, and tasting guidance.

trustedSources.title: The Cigar: Moments of Pleasure
trustedSources.author: Barnaby Conrad III
trustedSources.notes: Captures the art and lifestyle of cigars with stories, culture, and famous aficionados.

trustedSources.title: The Bar Book
trustedSources.author: Jeffrey Morgenthaler
trustedSources.notes: Masterclass in bartending techniques: ice, juice, syrups, shaking, stirring. Clear, practical, essential for both beginners and pros.

trustedSources.title: Meehan’s Bartender Manual
trustedSources.author: Jim Meehan
trustedSources.notes: Deep dive into bar design, tools, spirits, hospitality, and philosophy. Industry-insider insights from a true pioneer.

trustedSources.title: Liquid Intelligence
trustedSources.author: Dave Arnold
trustedSources.notes: Innovative, science-driven exploration of cocktails. Includes advanced methods: clarifying juices, carbonation, liquid nitrogen.

trustedSources.title: The Savoy Cocktail Book
trustedSources.author: Harry Craddock
trustedSources.notes: Iconic 1930s classic filled with over 750 vintage recipes. Aesthetic, historical, and foundational.

trustedSources.title: Death & Co: Modern Classic Cocktails
trustedSources.author: David Kaplan, Nick Fauchald, Alex Day
trustedSources.notes: Signature drinks from the famed NYC bar. Combines recipes, philosophy, and modern mixology artistry.

trustedSources.title: Cigar Aficionado’s World of Cigars
trustedSources.author: Marvin R. Shanken
trustedSources.notes: The cornerstone of cigar culture. Features chefs and curated pairings across food, wine, and cigars.

trustedSources.title: The Flavor Bible
trustedSources.author: Karen Page & Andrew Dornenburg
trustedSources.notes: A pairing matrix masterpiece. Reverse-engineer cigar flavors to match with foods and spirits.

trustedSources.title: Culinary Artistry
trustedSources.author: Andrew Dornenburg & Karen Page
trustedSources.notes: A chef’s toolkit for building harmonious, multisensory menus—perfect for pairing events.

trustedSources.title: The Impossible Collection of Cigars
trustedSources.author: Assouline
trustedSources.notes: High design meets high taste. Features celebrity chefs and luxury lifestyle integrations.

trustedSources.title: Salt, Fat, Acid, Heat
trustedSources.author: Samin Nosrat
trustedSources.notes: Fundamental flavor alchemy. Apply her quadrant theory to cigar pairing like a master blender.

trustedSources.title: Larousse Gastronomique
trustedSources.author: Larousse Editors
trustedSources.notes: The definitive culinary encyclopedia. Use it to match regional cuisines, sauces, or techniques to cigar terroir.

lessonFlags.notes: Used to dynamically segment content by learning depth and accreditation status

metadata.readinessExplanation: Percentage of QA criteria passed for release approval

membershipTiers.targetAudience: Casual smokers looking to deepen their cigar knowledge
features: Access to flavor trails and wrapper origin maps

membershipTiers.targetAudience: Enthusiasts seeking full pairing power and personal collection tools
features: Smart Pairing Engine (by wrapper, flavor, strength, etc.)
Save tasting notes and smoking history
Flavor-matching AI to discover similar cigars
5 'Ask the Maestro' comparison requests per month
Full access to Lounge Feed and community threads

membershipTiers.targetAudience: Avid collectors, professionals, and flavor explorers
features: Unlimited Maestro AI Spec Assistant access
Advanced cigar search filters (flavor, body, origin, vitola, region)
Humidor Pro: Unlimited capacity, age tracking, box-date logging
Access to Masterclass Library (blending, terroir, pairing theory)
Entry to exclusive Maestro’s Circle Forum
Priority support and early access to features

membershipTiers.targetAudience: Cigar lounges, retailers, and cigar hospitality businesses
features: Lounge Command Hub: Multi-location humidor dashboard
5 Staff Logins with custom permission levels
Custom printable spec cards, pairing sheets, and locker labels
Event toolkit: RSVP management, ticket generation, tasting menus
Lounge Analytics: cigar trends, pairing behavior, sales data
Verified Lounge Badge with public platform listing
Social Media Promo Generator: branded posts, flyers, QR menus
Private Lounge Network Access (with brands, reps, partner lounges)

projectDirective.purpose: Conduct a Multilayered Expert-Level Audit & Rebuild of the latest cigarmaestro.json, encompassing full review, structured enhancement, and stakeholder-aligned upgrades. This process must preserve all Eternal Directives, architectural integrity, and guiding principles—while elevating the file’s technical, educational, and experiential value.
stakeholders: Master Tobacconist – Flavor fidelity and practical training
Master Blender – Tobacco metadata and blend construction logic
College Professor – CEU alignment and LMS compatibility
Lounge Owner – Operational UX and brand storytelling
General Manager – Workflow efficiency and reliability
Cigar Enthusiasts – Engagement, clarity, and flavor discovery
Social Marketer – Visual appeal and shareable features
UI/UX Designer – Responsive design and typographic hierarchy
GPT Developer – Schema stability and prompt logic

UI/UX Optimization: Refactor mobile, desktop, and kiosk pathways
Cigar History Integration: Format stories for both academic use and social media
Educational Depth: Add tasting diagrams, sensory cues, flavor wheels
Accreditation Readiness: Enable CEU credit tracking and instructor tools
System Stability and Fixes: Correct schema, logic, and prompt errors
Reinforce version control and modular structure

finalDeliverables: Scoring (1–10) for each of the five pillars
Prioritized action plan by discipline: Development, Design, Content, UX
Enhanced JSON file including updated prompts and GPT-ready dialogue
goal: A cigarmaestro.json that is: Lounge-ready. Classroom-certified. GPT-stable. Brand-elevating. Developer-friendly. Unmistakably valuable.

highPriority: Refactor outdated or ambiguous keys in cigar spec modules using certified tobacconist phrasing.
Normalize nested modules for clearer GPT parsing.
Implement fallback chains and response triggers in schema for GPT-based conversations.
Ensure full SCORM-lite metadata encoding for LMS output compatibility.
Implement dynamic response templating for GPT replies and spec lookups across all modules.
Expand fallback logic trees for incomplete inputs, barcode errors, and ambiguous queries.
Deploy multilingual GPT prompt sets with translation fidelity checks.
mediumPriority: Modularize kiosk logic and POS pathways for scalability across retail environments.
Enforce strict camelCase convention across all keys.
Auto-generate REST API documentation from embedded schema for 3rd-party developers.
Add unit tests for schema validation and prompt accuracy.
Implement automated API schema documentation for public use.
Refactor GPT fallback logic to support multilingual queries and edge-case ambiguity detection.
Implement expanded pairing types UI/logic

highPriority: Apply WCAG and ADA compliance layers to all UI modules.
Polish interactive elements like dark mode toggles, contrast scaling, and touch zones.
Refactor kiosk interface for improved mobile-first touch interaction, including enlarged flavor wheels and cigar cards.
mediumPriority: Inject typographic hierarchy into story exports and pairing displays.
Refine kiosk layouts for brand-forward storytelling: include founder quotes, featured blends.
Add user-selectable UI theme packs for roles or aesthetics (e.g., Dark Humidor, Vintage Box).
Enable user-selectable UI theme packs based on mood, era, or role.
Enhance story and pairing card visuals with layered media: GIF support, audio blurbs.

highPriority: Expand CEU-aligned learning content with instructor notes, rubric logic, and quiz explanation fields.
Enhance glossary and flavor wheel links with shareable anchors and visual aids.
Insert 'Did You Know?' facts, sensory cues, and vitola diagrams directly into educational paths.
Integrate flavor diagram generator to visualize each cigar’s tasting profile in SVG format.
Add support for Masterclass video URL embedding in educational content modules.
mediumPriority: Update brand legacy maps and founder bio cards with Instagram-friendly assets.
Localize key terms for multilingual preview support.
Enable terroir-based filtering (e.g., Jalapa vs Estelí) in blend and flavor search tools.
Integrate historical trivia popups during lounge pairing experiences.
Embed CEU module sample video previews using LMS-friendly formats.
Cross-tag glossary items with flavor wheels and wrapper maps for seamless semantic discovery.

highPriority: Refactor onboarding flows for first-time users across all roles.
Ensure kiosk modules are optimized for tap-only environments and offline caching.
Enable full voice-only navigation mode for kiosk and hands-free scenarios.
Conduct real-world UX trials with lounge patrons and instructors to validate flow and usability.
mediumPriority: Enable timeline exploration and brand history via intuitive sliders and tag-based filters.
Gamify educational progress with badges for tasting milestones and quiz completions.
Enhance Flavor Journey gamification with collectible milestones and flavor discovery badges.
Develop drag-and-drop UI for humidor sorting and tagging.
Add tactile feedback triggers for kiosk interface (haptic sound/tap effects where applicable).
Build UGC-driven flavor leaderboard system

highPriority: Submit accreditation system to CEU certifying body for pilot approval.
Add audit-ready accreditation compliance pack with modular export.
mediumPriority: Build instructor dashboard for quiz and user performance tracking across CEU modules.
Implement CEU certificate PDF generator for accredited module completion.
Develop CEU transcript export feature for LMS administrators.
Add audit logs for accreditation completion to enhance compliance monitoring.

multimediaIntegration.notes: Enable multimedia assets for deeper storytelling and brand immersion.

storyModeNavigation.notes: Allow users to follow guided historical journeys, simulating a museum-like experience.

regionalLegacyMapExpansion.notes: Geographic expansion of cigar legacy for regional storytelling.

anniversaryTriggers.notes: Auto-trigger educational or promotional events around significant brand anniversaries.

crossLinkedEducation.notes: Connect history blocks to relevant educational paths and glossary terms.

socialAssetsTemplate.quote: Born in the volcanic soils of Estelí, this cigar roars with heritage.

development: Validate all schema logic with SCORM and CEU compliance models
Normalize nested module logic with fallbacks and language toggles
design: Enforce mobile-first kiosk design with ADA and WCAG overlays
Add user-role based UI theming for Instructors, Lounges, Collectors
content: Refine pairing decks with music/setting/mood data
Expand pipe tobacco blend metadata and export paths
ux: Gamify Flavor Journey and pairing unlocks
Improve onboarding flow for first-time users in lounge mode

body.description: Body strength of the cigar (e.g., mild, medium, full)

wrappers.description: Wrapper types compatible with this body strength

pairingEntry.description: A structured entry for body-based cigar pairings

distilleryEntry.description: Details for a single distillery's cigar pairing profile

membershipTier.description: Describes each subscription level and its constraints

uiHintStep.description: Standardized UI guidance for onboarding steps

title: Cigar Maestro Elite Schema
description: Validated modular schema for Cigar Maestro system including pairing logic, AI prompt triggers, educational modules, and LMS compatibility.

predictiveFlavorGraph.description: Integrates flavor_graph.jsonld for trajectory-based flavor prediction.

gptMemoryContexts.description: Allows toggling GPT memory between Retail, Learning, and Personal contexts.

instructorLiveDashboard.description: Instructor dashboard with quiz analytics and adaptive grading.

archiveEngine.description: Support for vintage specs, box code decoding, and resale value matrix.

localizationMatrix.description: Flavor lexicon and quiz translations across multiple languages.

creatorToolkit.description: Templates and tools for content creators: pairing reels, captions, export formats.

neuroadaptiveFeedback.description: Emotional and sentiment-based flavor recommendation adaptation.

aiSupport.examplePrompt: Create a pairing menu using a Maduro cigar and French cuisine focusing on sauce-heavy dishes.

registrationFilingTemplate.author: Michael Hamilton
registrationFilingTemplate.materialCreated: Entire JSON architecture, structure, and content. Includes educational modules, flavor mapping logic, accreditation framework, and pairing engine specifications.
registrationFilingTemplate.exclusions: Does not include generic schema formats or publicly available flavor descriptions.

contexts.explanationHint: This response was selected based on wrapper, flavor profile, and GPT pairing logic.
contexts.fallbackReasonHint: Defaulted to wrapper category if exact cigar was unavailable.

contexts.fallbackReasonHint: Defaulted to wrapper category if exact cigar was unavailable.

meta.gptHint: This module supports certified tobacco dialogue, pairing suggestions, and spec comparisons.
meta.expectedOutput: Structured cigar specification response or pairing list.
meta.examplePrompt: Compare a Padron 1964 with an Oliva Serie V for flavor and construction.

roleThemeHints.Lounge: Bold, kiosk-friendly theme with swipe/tap interaction.
roleThemeHints.Instructor: Minimalist academic layout with sidebar notes.
roleThemeHints.SocialInfluencer: Media-rich, portrait-mode optimized with promo overlays.

legalGuidance.description: Provides users access to verified federal regulations concerning cigars, cigarillos, and little filtered cigars. Local city, county, or state laws may vary and should be consulted via appropriate government websites.

federalReference.summary: This page outlines the FDA's regulatory approach to cigar manufacturing, labeling, and sales, including packaging requirements and prohibited sales practices.

localAdvisory.note: For information on city, county, or state-specific cigar laws, users are encouraged to consult their local health department, municipal code office, or state tobacco control authority. Laws may include restrictions on flavored cigars, public smoking, or retail licensing.

specLookup.template: Fetch official specs for {cigar_name} including wrapper, binder, filler, and flavor notes.
specLookup.example: Fetch official specs for Padron 1964 Anniversary Maduro

pairingSuggestion.template: Suggest spirits that pair with {cigar_name} based on flavor and wrapper.
pairingSuggestion.example: Suggest spirits that pair with Oliva Serie V Melanio Maduro
